Invocation Name: vantage
des:
Now you can control the lights, thermostats in your house if it's equipped with a Vantage Infusion system and an Alexa_Gateway device (sold separately).
NOTE that your Amazon account will be used to link you with with the user created in our Vantage database!
STEPS TO ENABLE AND LINK YOUR ACCOUNT:
1. In the Alexa app, install the "Vantage home automation" skill.
2. Once installed, open the skill and enable it by pressing the "Enable" button which will bring you to a new page.
3. On this new page, you'll have to click on "Continue" to sign in to the "Vantage home automation". If you don't see the "Continue" button you'll first need to enter your Amazon username and Amazon password to sign in. If you don't have an Amazon account, you can create one here as well by pressing "Create a new Amazon account"
4. Once pressed, you should receive the confirmation "Your Vantage home automation Skill was successfully linked.
5. Close this confirmation page.

IF THE APP IS ENABLED BUT NOT LINKED:
In case you cancelled or timed out on the above steps, additional steps might be required. This is the case if the Alexa app is enabled but the account is not linked yet.
6. Select the skill "Vantage home automation" and press the "link account" button.
7. Linking your account brings you to a new page where you can select "Continue" to sign in to "Vantage home automation"
8. You should receive the confirmation "Your Vantage home automation Skill was successfully linked.
***************************************

You'll need to contact your dealer to install a "Vantage - Alexa Gateway" and provide him with your username.
Your dealer will install the required links for loads and thermostats and scenes.
Contact mailto:support.vantage@vantage-emea.com if you don't know who your dealer or installer is.
Modify your light circuit names afterwards via this link: https://www.vantageemea.com and select "Alexa Configuration"
